definition: to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: A 70-fold increase in speed for a sevenfold increase in price would seem a bargain.
sentences.chinese: 速度增加70倍，價格才漲了7倍，似乎很划得來。

sentences.english: These toys are areal bargain at such low prices.
sentences.chinese: 這些玩具的代價這麼便宜，真划得來。

sentences.english: Was it worthwhile opening a shoe-store?
Fracking might still be worth doing given those costs.
sentences.chinese: 儘管需要消納這些成本，水力壓裂仍然是划得來做的。

sentences.english: They doubted whether all this work would pay off.
sentences.chinese: 他們懷疑這樣幹是否划得來。

sentences.english: It pays to buy goods owing to their superior quality.
sentences.chinese: 買高質量的貨京東取消訂單物是划得來的。
